$interpreted: Diana: Godfather...I've come to see you.
Diana: Although the wind barrier and those monsters have been taken care of. The kingdom still needs to be reconstructed. The Queen must be there.
Diana: It's been tough to find the time to visit...
Diana: So today, I brought this with me.
Diana: ...Do you remember? Clover crystals...
Diana: I've brought some clover crystals to keep you company. What do you say, Godfather?
Diana: ...Can...can you still hear me?
Charle: ...Queen Diana? The soldiers told me you've been extremely busy. Why the sudden visit?
Diana: I came to see you, Headmaster Charle Ceres.
Charle: Me? But I already stepped down as headmaster. I'm afraid I can't speak on behalf of the Academy.
Diana: Leaving your position does not affect your vast knowledge base.

Diana: The soldiers have already reported back to the Kingdom of the Sun, and yet you remain here, researching the Snake God...
...and the structure of the Dragon Tooth.
Charle: Indeed. I'm still awaiting the help of this great nation's soldiers regarding the location of my son.
Charle: ...You know how us scholars are. Since I can't leave just yet, staying busy is better than simply waiting around.
Diana: You mean Elio?
Diana: We're working hard. We'll let you know as soon as we hear anything. I believe we'll find him in no time.
Charle: I sure hope so...
Diana: I've taken time out of my busy schedule just to see the Dragon Tooth. May I ask what your current research has revealed?
Charle: Ah, so you too are interested...
Charle: Unfortunately, I know as much about the Dragon Tooth as I do of the Dragonstone Gem——essentially nothing.
Diana: How could that be...?
Charle: Both possess an enormous amount of Soul Energy, but our current Rune technology has no way of deciphering them.
Charle: It could be exactly as that mysterious Rune sorcerer said. Remnants from the civilization of the Immortals...
Diana: Yes, that fellow...
Diana: Disappearing as soon as we had picked up on him. He's as suspicious as Devious and those Dracontines!
Charle: To me he seems troubled by something...
Diana: Though this may be the case, can you at least tell me why the dragon of human lore has appeared in the desert?
Charle: I've looked over the manuscripts and it appears that the earliest beliefs of the Desert Kingdom were not that of the Snake Religion.
Diana: ...Indeed. The earlier myths spoke of lizards...
Diana: But that is from ancient times. Nowadays, all the citizens of the Desert Kingdom, including the royal house, believe in the Snake God.
Charle: I'm afraid that the Dracontines have replaced your traditional religion.
Diana: What!?
Charle: As well as deliberately tricking your people into believing that the Dragon Tooth was the rib of the Snake God.
Charle: I believe this may even be occurring in other nations as well...
Diana: Impossible! What would it benefit the Dracontines to undergo such painstaking efforts?
Charle: I'm not sure. Currently, there aren't many leads.
Charle: Having said that, perhaps the void explosion that occurred in Atlas is related...
Royal Infantry: Your Majesty!
Royal Infantry: News has arrived from the border. Someone has reported seeing the silver-haired boy you are looking for!
Charle: Where-Where is he!?
Royal Infantry: He had been taken...taken away.
Charle: Who!? Who took him away!?
Royal Infantry: I-I don't know. The information we received described him as wearing glasses with dark blue hair. He claimed to be a famous physician...
Charle: (These features...there's no way it's...Aosta!?)
Charle: I must take my leave, Your Highness!
Diana: Headmaster Ceres has helped our nation greatly. Send men to assist him.
Royal Infantry: Yes, ma'am!
Royal Infantry: However, there's something we must report to Your Highness.
Diana: An invitation to the East Alliance Martial Arts Tourney?
Royal Infantry: Yes, ma'am! It was delivered by an ambassador of the East Alliance.
Diana: Indeed, I've been so busy that I completely forgot about it.
Diana: Is this...Udumbara?
Diana: Such a sweet fragrance...
Diana: ...Wait a second, now that I think about it, the Holy City of the East Alliance is also called......Dragon——

Your Majesty!

He had been taken...taken away.

(These features...there's no way it's...Aosta!?)
I must take my leave, Your Highness!
Headmaster Ceres has helped our nation greatly. Send men to assist him.
Yes, ma'am!
However, there's something we must report to Your Highness.

Indeed, I've been so busy that I completely forgot about it.
Is this...Udumbara?
Such a sweet fragrance...
...Wait a second, now that I think about it, the Holy City of the East Alliance is also called......Dragon——
